data.meanings: to serve, worship or adore; to protect, grant refuge, preserve save, rescue, liberate; object of worship ie God; (Alif-Lam-Lam-ha) God, the one true God applied as a proper name denoting the true god, comprising all the excellent divine names; a unity comprising all the essences of existing things.
data.sentence: The word اللَّهِ comes from the root ا ل ه and is associated with the meanings: to serve, worship or adore; to protect, grant refuge, preserve save, rescue, liberate; object of worship ie God; (Alif-Lam-Lam-ha) God, the one true God applied as a proper name denoting the true god, comprising all the excellent divine names; a unity comprising all the essences of existing things.
The word مِنَ comes from the root م ن and is associated with the meanings: From
The word وَنَحْنُ comes from the root ن ح ن and is associated with the meanings: We
The word وَمَنْ comes from the root م ن and is associated with the meanings: From

data.meanings: to dye, colour, baptize, dip, immerse, hue, assume the attribute, mode, mature, code of law, religion, nature.
data.sentence: The word صِبْغَةَ comes from the root ص ب غ and is associated with the meanings: to dye, colour, baptize, dip, immerse, hue, assume the attribute, mode, mature, code of law, religion, nature.

data.meanings: To be handsome, make good, seem good or beautiful, be excellent.
data.sentence: The word أَحْسَنُ comes from the root ح س ن and is associated with the meanings: To be handsome, make good, seem good or beautiful, be excellent.

data.meanings: to dye, colour, baptize, dip, immerse, hue, assume the attribute, mode, mature, code of law, religion, nature.
data.sentence: The word صِبْغَةً comes from the root ص ب غ and is associated with the meanings: to dye, colour, baptize, dip, immerse, hue, assume the attribute, mode, mature, code of law, religion, nature.

data.meanings: serve, worship, adore, venerate, accept the impression of a thing, obey with submissiveness or humility, approve, apply, devote, obedience, slave, keep to inseparably, subdue, assemble together, enslave.
data.sentence: The word عَابِدُونَ comes from the root ع ب د and is associated with the meanings: serve, worship, adore, venerate, accept the impression of a thing, obey with submissiveness or humility, approve, apply, devote, obedience, slave, keep to inseparably, subdue, assemble together, enslave.
